title: news.com.au — Australia’s #1 news site
text: Renée Zellweger’s highly anticipated depiction of the iconic Hollywood star Judy Garland will come to Australian cinemas on Thursday. The biopic has generated significant attention and some Oscar buzz for Ms Zellweger, who left the spotlight for several years before returning for this role. Ms Zellweger said the prospect of playing Garland seemed “absurd” at first, though she decided to pursue the idea out of curiosity and admiration for the American icon. “It’s hard to imagine that she was able to sustain, considering the things that she was grappling with for a lifetime," Ms Zellweger told Sky News entertainment reporter Samantha Dawson. Image: AP
